title: In Conversation with: Prof Catherine Burns
author: Johan Maritz
contentHtml: The CSA&G’s Gender Justice Partnership has published the first episode of its ‘In Conversation with…’ series. In this episode they are in conversation with Prof Catherine Burns, a medical historian.
contentText: The CSA&G’s Gender Justice Partnership has published the first episode of its ‘In Conversation with…’ series. In this episode they are in conversation with Prof Catherine Burns, a medical historian.
